languages.text: "Если мирянам нельзя общаться с духом машины, то вам можно, почтенная техножрица. А Джиневри рядом постоит".

traits.locale_text: "Если мирянам нельзя общаться с духом машины, то вам можно, почтенная техножрица. А Джиневри рядом постоит".

languages.text: "Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."
languages.original_text: "Если мирянам нельзя общаться с духом машины, то вам можно, почтенная техножрица. А Джиневри рядом постоит".

traits.locale_text: "Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."
"Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."
"Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, Just-Logicarius. Jinevra will merely stand at your side and observe."
"Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, Just-Logicarius. Jinevra will merely stand at your side and observe."
"Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."
"Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."

languages.text: « Les profanes n'ont peut-être pas le droit de communier avec l'esprit de la machine, mais ce n'est pas votre cas, honorable technoprêtresse. Jinevri se contentera d'assister à l'opération sans intervenir. »
languages.original_text: "Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."

traits.locale_text: « Les profanes n'ont peut-être pas le droit de communier avec l'esprit de la machine, mais ce n'est pas votre cas, juste-logicarius. Jinevra se contentera d'assister à l'opération sans intervenir. »

languages.text: «Los laicos tienen prohibido entrar en comunión con el espíritu máquina, pero usted no, estimada tecnosacerdotisa. Jinevri se limitará a permanecer a su lado y observar».
languages.original_text: "Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."

traits.locale_text: «Los laicos tienen prohibido entrar en comunión con el espíritu máquina, pero usted no, Justi-Logicarius. Jinevra se limitará a permanecer a su lado y observar».

languages.text: “或许教外人士不允许与机魂进行交流，但你并不是教外人士，尊敬的技术神甫。杰尼娃只会在你身边观察，不会做其他事情。”
languages.original_text: "Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."

traits.locale_text: “或许教外人士不允许与机魂进行交流，但你并不是教外人士，裁决逻辑士。杰尼娃只会在你身边观察，不会做其他事情。”

languages.text: 「素人が機械精霊と交わることは禁じられているかもしれないが、お前は違うだろう、高名なる技術司祭よ。ジネヴリは、ただお前の側に立って観察するだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."

traits.locale_text: 「素人が機械霊と交わることは禁じられているかもしれないが、お前は違うだろう？ジャスト・ロジカリウス。ジネブラは、ただお前の側に立って観察するだ。」

languages.text: "Laien ist es zwar verboten, mit dem Maschinengeist Zwiesprache zu halten, Euch jedoch nicht, verehrte Techpriesterin. Jinevri wird nur neben Euch stehen und beobachten."
languages.original_text: "Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."

traits.locale_text: "Laien ist es zwar verboten, mit dem Maschinengeist Zwiesprache zu halten, Euch jedoch nicht, Just-Logicarius. Jinevra wird lediglich neben Euch stehen und beobachten."

languages.text: "Avam tabakası için makine ruhuyla iletişime geçmek yasak olsa da senin için değil muhterem Tekno Rahip. Jinevri, yalnızca yanında durup gözlem yapacak."
languages.original_text: "Laypeople may be prohibited from communing with the machine spirit, but you are not, esteemed Tech-Priest. Jinevri will merely stand at your side and observe."
